name: FitNotes Data Backup
summary: Learn about .FITNOTES files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FitNotes is a free app fitness enthusiasts use to record their workouts and track their progress. To save workout data in a FITNOTES backup file:
Tap the three-dot button on the Home screen

description: A FITNOTES file is a backup created by FitNotes, a workout-tracking app for Android. It stores a user's data, which includes one or more workouts (including their reps and weight), body measurements, routines, and personal records. FitNotes users create FITNOTES files to preserve workout data or transfer it to another FitNotes app.

instructions: You can open a FITNOTES file with the FitNotes app. For example, to restore the FITNOTES file:
Tap the three-dot button on the Home screen
When you open a FITNOTES file, the app overwrites the current workout data in the FitNotes app.
